column5: hey guys I’m in Sudbury for a few months and would like to get out to do some shore fishing for pretty much anything . Wondering if there is any good spots . I wouldn’t mind catching some pike , some eyes or some trout . Any info would be a big help …. Thank you
Thanks . Not much on there for little trout lakes and kinda looking for more of an off the beaten path kinda lake . I heard Ramsey is pretty busy of a place
